choices: Your family and friends gathered in the kitchen (Someone Else)
Your family and friends gathered near the bathroom (Body Part)
A slew of items scattered on the living room table (Inanimate Object)
A bunch of items on the kitchen table (NEW:  Someone's Possession)
1.content:
As you wake up, you groggily slam the button on your alarm clock to get it to shut up. You are about to fall back asleep, when you hear loud yelling from downstairs:
"AUSTIN!!! Get down here! It's 11:00 in the morning!"
Groaning, you slide out of bed, throw whatever clothes on you can find, and head downstairs, where you see...
1.title: The beginning

choices: You are your little sister, Jessica (she's 5; long, flowing red hair)
You are your older sister, Kari (she's 22; shoulder-length brown hair)
You are your cousin, Alayna (she's 16; darker-skinned; brown hair to mid-back)
You are your girlfriend, Sydney (she's 18; long, blonde hair)
11.content:
...a bunch of people you know gathered in the kitchen.

"Uh...is it someone's birthday?" you ask worriedly.

"No, just a little experiment," your mom slyly answers. Now you're really worried. "Just sit in that chair, will ya?"
You walk over to an odd-looking machine, and sit in one of the two chairs connected to it.

Mom brings ______ over to the other chair, having them sit down. She then whacks a button on the machine, and you black out.

When you wake up...
11.title: Body-Swap

choices: Mom decides to tell you the truth
Mom admits nothing; gives you a chore to do as Jessica
Give up on these two; look somewhere else
111.content:
... you're no longer by the machine but lying in Jessica's bed. The blinds are pulled down, the door shut, and even in the shadows her pink wallpaper nearly blinds you. Posters of Olympic gymnasts, boy bands, and cartoons block out some of the brightness, enough you can focus your eyes and try to lift yourself.

Your limbs refuse and tighten up, not because you're sore, tense or tired; not because of any immediately familiar reason. You try to feel the edge of her bed with your toes, yet it seems a few feet too far. It didn't take much stretching to cover the length of your bed... why should Jessica's mattress be longer? Besides her pillow resting under your neck, you feel a soft broom head too, its bristles sprawled around your head, climbing up your scalp, across your vision, red strands...

A red broom...? But that's not...

Why do you feel empty in a certain place, somewhere dark, under the covers...

Your eyes glance from the room to the Cinderella pajamas, fuzzy and sky-blue, sticking to a svelte body two feet shorter than what you're used to. One wayward turn of your head and the broom unfurls into an impenetrable wall of red. You blow it away and it returns, never flying too far; this broom head is a part of you. And that means...

Two minutes later you're bolting down the stairs, trying not to trip in these unfamiliar, daintier feet, aware the world stretches up and away, just out of reach. You cry in a cotton candy voice, so sweet you barely hear your own anger: "Mom! Mom!"

Your Mom walks out the kitchen with a sponge in hand. "What's the matter, dear?" she asks innocently. "Are you okay, Jessica?"

"I'm not Jessica!" you yell. Mom tries to pick you up but you jump back. "You put me in that machine with Jessica and then we... we switched bodies!"

"What's the li'l squirt whining about?" Your old body strolls out from behind Mom, dressed in the same clothes you'd put on that morning, munching a bagel with a lazy, glazed look in his eye. You try to spot a hint--small, big, anything--telling you this is really Jessica, but if it is she's putting a good front. "You say the stupidest things sometimes, Jess."

"Now Austin," Mom cooed, "let's not be mean to Jessica. It's wonderful she has such an active imagination." A migraine builds up behind your forehead. You clench your fists and restrain the urge to scream, but you're not sure how long you can hold...
111.title: Transformed into Jessica

choices: Dont do it. Mom's not gonna punish you.
Steel your resolve and head back downstairs.
1112.content:
"Mooom! Cut it out!" you say, failing not to sound like Jessica whining.

"Now, now, Jessica." Mom says dismissively. "Before we play any games, you need to go get dressed and clean up your room, okay?"

Grunting in annoyance, you turn your head away from her - catching sight of your body in the living room. He/she/it is laying on the couch in a slobbish pose, eating that bagel and spilling crumbs everywhere. Seeing yourself from the outside like this is... jarring. You remind yourself you've never cared how other people see you, but actually being another person makes that difficult.

"Jessica..." Mom says in an annoyed tone. Still ignoring her, you look down at yourself. You study the details of Jessica's body and look back up at your own to try and compare. For a second, you're almost finding this interesting.

"Jessica! I said get dressed and clean your room!" Mom snaps. Suddenly intimidated, you hastily start to comply, only to regain your senses and slow down as you approach the stairs. You look back (and up) at your mom's face. The stern expression is completely unlike her. She has to be messing with you - probably an "experiment" to see how you'll act in this situation. Mom's experiments tend to clearly be more for her own amusement than for any scientific reason. And she wonders why no-one takes her seriously.

Still, feeling small, weak and emasculated, you can't bring yourself to object any more, so you slowly start climbing the stairs. You find it difficult with your little legs, and having to raise them draws your attention to the emptiness in between. By the time you reach the top, you feel even more weak and helpless.

You take deep breaths - which don't really help, as they draw more attention to the unfamiliar body - and try to compose yourself.
1112.title: It's hard to be a bad kid

11121.content: After you catched your breath you headed into Jessica’s room and clean it which to be honest wasn’t that dirty, just a pile of dirty clothes on her floor and her toys. After you clean ‘your’ room your mom comes in. “Hey Jessica good job cleaning your room now hurry up and get dressed we’re going to the mall.” She says as she nearly leaves ‘your’ room but pauses. “Oh, I almost forgot I picked out an outfit on your bed for you Sweetie.” And with that she leaves the room. Curious you go over to the bed and investigate. Laying on the bed was a very girly outfit you had no intention of wearing. On the bed was a bright pink long sleeved dress with a ruffle skirt, white tights and white panties with pink horizontal stripes, a pair of frilly socks, and black riding boots with bows on the cuffs. “There is no way I’m wearing that.” You say as look around for something else. After looking around you couldn’t really find anything else that was better and fearing being yelled at by your mom again you decide to give in and put on the clothes. First you take off your pajamas and panties and notice right away that you really are a girl albeit a premature one although, you had to admit it does feel a little better to move around without your old privates. Not wanting to harp on your new stuff especially when it’s your younger sister’s you quickly put on the pink panties and the tights which felt tighter than your underwear in the crotch area but still felt oddly comfortable. You then put on the dress which you really did not want to do but seeing as you have no choice you did it anyway. Finally you put on the socks then you slip your feet into the boots. Right after you get dressed your mom comes in. “Ohhh you look so cute Jessica, now it’s time to go.” She says as she leads you to the car. “Here let me help you.” She says as she picks you up and puts you in a booster seat then buckles you up. You swear she’s trying to get a reaction out you. She then buckles up and you both drive off.
11121.title: Go clean your... Jessica's room.

choices: You are Jessica's hair (she's 5; long, red hair to her butt)
You are Alayna's left incisor tooth (she's 16)
12.content:
...a bunch of familiar people crowded around the bathroom door.

"Why...Did the toilet break again?" you inquire, extremely confused.
"Nope, just thought I'd do a little experiment with the - with something," Mom answers coyly. "Just go into the guy's room and sit on the chair."

You enter the guy's bathroom in your house, and sit on a chair connected to the wall.

You hear Mom usher _____ into the ____ bathroom, then hear a click. Suddenly, everything goes black.

When you wake up...
12.title: Body Part TF

123.content:
Everything feels weird. You feel like you're hanging off of something, and your face is all swollen up. A striped tarp is stretched across you, but you can't seem to move it off, even as you wiggle back and forth. You have a very strange taste in your mouth as well.

"Hehehe looks like Austin's awake!" Kari's voice sounds gigantic and echoey, like she's huge compared to you. were you shrunk? You feel a pair of hands squeeze your face.

"Bluh... Kari, what happened? Where am I?" you ask, trying to get your bearings.

"Didn't mom tell you? Here, let me show you!" The tarp is pulled off, and you can see light. It looks like Kari's bathroom, but huge! You can see her mirror in front of you. She's bending over, and showing her ass... right in front of you...!

"That's right, Austin, you're now my butt! Isn't this cool!"

You want to scream, but all that comes out is a fart.

"We're going to have so much fun together! First, though, I want to..."
123.title: You are Kari's butt (again, she's 22)

choices: Go On A reality show for freaks(Girl with Talking Butt)
A more Freaky Swap(Austin is Kari and Kari is her own Butt)
Kari Has To Take A shit(toilet torture,HOW ORIGINAL)
1233.content:
Mom Can ya Modify my butt so Austin can talk,sure honey said mom,...15 minutes later...AHHH said Austin why do I have to be Kari’s ass,This Is all part of the experiment,now Kari what were u going to do with Austin now that he can talk again...hmm well..
Can Someone please add a new chapter, preferably in the first 2 choices)

125231.content: You Hear A big Slam and a squeak fart from the other side of the wall,you here you moms voice Time to test the machine on My beautiful Mom butt,you Feel like your subconscious is being transferred through the machine,I GOTTA GET OUT BEFORE ITS- But it was already too late,You wake up looking In a mirror but something was off,you were looking at yourself but you looked like your mom‘s naked butt, wakey wakey son I transferred your soul into my own big butt..can u still talk?
125231.title: Mom butt she 42)

choices: She Signed up For a Twerking competition Downtown 6 days ago
She Challenges Kari To A Spicy Food Eating Contest
1252311.content: Mom This is the worst thing you have ever done to me Said Austin,Oh dont be such a Party POOPER ahahah I’m sorry I had to do that pun She said as she squeezed ur buttcheeks,Great Being my moms big,squishy,butt,can this get any worse...
1252311.title: Yes,You Can Still Talk

choices: your girlfriend, Sydney's pink, lacey bra (she's 18)
13.content:
...A slew of items on the living room table.

"Uh...what's this about?" you ask, slightly amused. "Did you go on another shopping spree?"
"NO!!!" screams your mother. "Just...sit on this chair here."

You walk over to an odd-looking machine, and sit on one of the two chairs connected to it.

Your mom looks like she's trying to pick an object, and she finally settles on the ____, setting it on the other chair.
She whams a button on the machine, and you suddenly black out...
13.title: Inanimate TF

choices: She puts you through the machine again for "enhancements"
She'll think about it later; sets you aside for now
131.content:
You don't open your eyes because there's no eyelids to open. Rather, your vision pops out of nowhere and remains fixated on a point ahead of you, which is the chair you had been sitting in seconds before. You stare at it underneath the arm of the other chair, hovering above you like a doorway, and so assume you're now sitting in the second chair. Mom had placed an object there, though you can't remember what. An attempt to speak aloud (you think of saying, "Jesus! The hell?" and some other expletives) hits a dead-end when you discover you're missing all orifices and organs necessary for speech. Shortly after, you notice there's no limbs to move either; your body winds upon itself: joining in the back, weaving over in two strips, then wrapping up from beneath in a comforting curve. If you feel any sensation, lacking nerves and skin, it's looseness and intimidation. The world intimidates you now; it's so massive, even when limited to your stuffy living room.

Also, you can't seem to get the song "Under the Sea" out of your head.

"Brilliant!" A hand scoops you up from behind; you expect a rush of vertigo and vomit but you only feel weightless. Your "body" whips against the momentum. Someone dangles you four feet above the carpet, which looks dangerous from your height, with your stature. "The transfer was a success. The soul of a human can be placed in something as lifeless as... a piece of fabric!"

Even before you're flipped around to face her large, laughing face, you recognize your mom's voice and assume only the worst. She'd wanted to win a Nobel Peace Prize since high school, even while her wacky inventions made her look less like Edison or Tesla and more like a drunk, incompetent Rube Goldberg. She kept trying throughout the years, testing some devices on you (one changed your hair green for a whole month) but the habit died down and you prayed she'd abandoned her wayward dreams for good. Now you know: Never assume your crazy mom's stopped being crazy.

"I can feel the nylon brimming with vitality!" She giggles like a child. "I wonder if I can make your thoughts audible... Or what'll happen once you're hugging Jessica's body! Ooh, the possibilities!"
131.title: Under the Seams! Under the Seams!

1311.content:
Your mom turns her head, "Oh Jessica!" She says in a sing-songy voice, your little sister quickly rushing down.

"Yes Mommy?" She asks innocently.

"We're going swimming today!" Your mom says smiling, giving you to Jessica.

"Yay!" She shouts, rushing to the bathroom, taking off her clothes.

'No! NOT yay!' You try to say, but it's no use, your sister quickly puts you on. You're body starts to hug your sister's body. Giving her a snug feel. But it feels unnatural to you. You weren't supposed to do this!
1311.title: She gives you to Jessica

choices: She turns you into something else
She tries giving you another ability
1312.content:
"Okay, test number two!" your mother declares, before setting you back down on the chair. Your fabric body crumples on itself, an uncomfortable sensation. Seeing the empty other chair, you realise your actual body is nowhere to be seen. You really hope Mom just moved it somewhere.

She flips a switch (or that's what it sounds like - you can't move your vision to see up there), and you feel a jolt of electricity. Up to this point, you're not sure you were actually feeling anything - it might just be all in your head (so to speak) - but you definitely felt that. Mom picks you up again.

"Argh, what now?" you think. To your surprise,your mom's face lights up in response.

"Aha! I can hear you now! Hi, Austin!" she says in that aggravatingly cheerful manner of hers.

"Mom! This is not cool! Knock it off and change me back!" you think at her.

"Oh, come on! Don't you realise how amazing this is!?" she says. "You're defying all sorts of established science right now! You're an ordinary piece of clothing, but you're alive. You don't have a brain, but you're thinking. You don't have eyes or ears, but you can see and hear me!"

She has a point. This is leagues above all the dumb stuff she's done in the past. She might just be able to get some recognition for this.

But you're not about to admit that.

"Yeah, great," you instead reply. "I'd really like those things back now, though."

"Don't be such a spoilsport! We're just getting started! Now, what should I try next, hm?"

You don't bother to reply, knowing she wouldn't listen.
1312.title: You're a talking swimsuit

choices: NOW she gives you to Jessica
She gives you the ability to move
13122.content:
"Let's go for an object-to-object transfer," Mom says, placing you on the chair once more. This time you're facing the back of it, so you can't see the other one. That was probably deliberate.

"Now, what to use this time... ah, of course!" She puts something in the other chair and hits the machine's button far harder than necessary. You black out again.

When you come to, you feel strange. You felt strange before, of course, but this is a different strange. You feel almost like you have limbs again, but you're still immobile and even smaller than before. The living room is positively cavernous. Mom picks you up, in one hand this time, squeezing you a little (which tells you you're not hollow any more).

"Can you still talk to me, Austin?" your mom asks.

"What the heck did you do now?" you 'say'.

"You could've just said yes," she complains as she places you on top of the machine - which is twice as tall as the chairs. You feel as if you're looking down from a mountaintop.

"Here, I'll show what I did," Mom says. She holds up a hand mirror (as big as you) and you see your reflection - a plush doll of a girl in a black dress, with blonde hair and a smiling face. It seems like something Jessica would like, but you've never seen it before, which makes you think Mom bought it for this purpose. Couldn't she have at least picked a male doll?

After a few seconds, Mom pulls the mirror away. "Aren't you pretty? You're the world's first living doll! How about that?"

"Ugh... okay... so now what?" you ask wearily, seeing no point in asking to be changed back.

"Don't be a grouch! Dolls are meant to be fun! You know what would be really fun?"

You dread to hear the answer.
13122.title: Well, it's a step in the right direction...

131221.content:
"Oh, Jes-sicaaa~!" Mom shouts out the door in the most horribly sing-song voice you've ever heard. You now know exactly what a tilde sounds like. The only thing worse than that voice is the feeling of dread as you hear Jessica's little feet rushing down the stairs. You can see where this is going

Mom quickly grabs you and whips you behind her back. Again, the movement seems like it should be nauseating.

"I've got a surprise for you, honey!" she says as a curious Jessica enters the room. Mom holds you out for Jessica to see. "A new dolly! Isn't she the cutest?"

"Wow! Thanks Mom!" Jessica says before eagerly snatching you from Mom's grasp. She turns around and cheerily skips towards the stairs with you in her hand. At this point you wish you could feel sick; the lack of any feeling from being thrown around is freaking you out.

"You two have fun!" Mom shouts after you. Jessica quickly climbs the stairs and approaches her room.

"Jessica! It's me, Austin!" you mentally shout.
131221.title: Playtime

choices: She gives you the ability to change your size
13123.content:
She rubs your fabric back and forth between her thumb and forefinger. Your body tingles as she does, a strange, exotic sensation rippling through you. Evidently she feels something similar. "All that energy and life spilling out of such a small garment... It feels fantastic! I can't help but wonder what it would be like wearing you. Your entire essence hugging my -"

"N-no!" you shriek. "I'm only a child's swimsuit! You'll tear me to pieces!"

"Oh, don't worry about that. I may be wrong, but if my calculations are right an ensouled item should be near indestructible. Like one of Voldermort's horcruxes."

"I never read Lord of the Rings!"

She holds you by each of your shoulder-straps. You dangle limp, but your body suddenly goes taut as elastic as she stretches you apart. She stretches you wider and wider, your body resisting, her arms beginning to shake with the effort, but your body refusing to snap, even as every strand of you vibrates with the tension.

Hooking one of the straps over the door handle, she levers against it with her body until you're ten feet wide. The tension is unbearable, your mind screaming for release. Finally, her grip gives out. You snap back like an elastic band, shrinking back to your "original" form in seconds.

"Totally indestructible," she pants, wiping sweat from her brow. "I could put you in the microwave and you wouldn't even singe."

"Please don't!"

"I said 'could'. Relax, you're safer now than you were as a human."

"I'd still like to be human again..."

"Just a few more experiments," she said, picking you up and returning to stroking you between her fingers. She really liked that sensation. "This is the crux of my research - to see if all that soul energy can be harnessed for other effects."
13123.title: She tries giving you another ability

132.content:
(This chapter taken directly from the original, with edits)

As you wake up, you are at a totally new perspective. You can't move your body at all. You keep facing straight up. All you see is a strap. A giant face high above you enters your vision. It is your mother. Either she has grown huge, or you have shrunk.

"Hello there!" she smiles. Her giant hand picks you up like you are nothing. She turns to the mirror. You see your mother holding a flip flop in her hand. No one else is around. Suddenly you realize. YOU ARE THE FLIP FLOP. You try to scream but no sound escapes your new inanimate body. Your mother then turns your face to meet hers.

"I bet you're wondering what happened. Well, I recently invented the BSM, which swaps the bodies of any two people or things. Naturally I wanted to test the limits of it so I used you. Sorry about that." She turns you around so quickly you feel like barfing. You see your body, motionless still on the chair.
"Your body is on stand by. This is what we're gonna do. The BSM needs 24 hours to cool down. So you're stuck like this until then. But don't worry, you won't be lonely or bored. You're gonna be worn by Kari.

Your mom picks you up and takes you upstairs. She puts you next to the door with the other flip-flop, then calls Kari down. Kari puts you on, crushing you, then walks out and gets into the car. Kari then drives to...
132.title: I was made for walkin'

choices: "Now," Mom says, "to turn on your speech capabilities."
"And now to show you Sydney's new form!" your mom declares.
Mom looks out of the room. "Sydney? You can come in now."
133.content:
When you come back to, you're staring at the ceiling several stories above you. "Uggghhh..." you say, only you can't feel the words coming out of a mouth or originating from your body. You can't feel yourself breathing either. You make one lazy effort to touch your chest, but your arms refuse to move. Your body feels inflated, pushed forward from your backside like there's a ton of gas inside of you waiting to be released - a not entirely unfamiliar sensation.

But you can't deny you're much smaller and not blinking or breathing or moving. You're like a tiny corpse. That's when you feel something pinching your arms - thin, flat and long - and you're off the ground, air rushing around you. "Whoa!" you cry, until you're face-to-face with the mirror. You see your mom holding you, dangling your arms up and down, making you dance...

"Look at you!" she squeals. "My own son - my first successful object transfer!"

Ohh no, you think, an action not too different from if you said it. Two pink cups of an ornate design with flowers outlined inside the lace... Sweet Sydney had taken a liking to your abrasive disregard for hygiene and shown you this piece of apparel on a few occasions, but you'd never thought you'd see it in your own reflection!

My own girlfriend's bra... What a strange turn of circumstance.
133.title: Austin as a Bra

1332.content:
"And if you think you're pretty, well, just you wait until you see what I did with Sydney!"

Not Sydney! you think. You had always told Sydney about Mom's experiments and complained what she liked to do to you, and she sympathized, although you suspected she thought the whole thing an elaborate joke, but Mom had never gone so far as to drag Sydney into her mad games. She had always limited her studies to her children.

Mom carries you away from the mirror, down the hall, and back into the room where you had sat down when the experiment again. She takes you to the table where Sydney's bra had been set. Now, in its place, you see...
1332.title: Sydney's with you on this

choices: Your girlfriend, Sydney's, tye-dyed two-piece bikini swimsuit (she's 18)

135.title: You are...

1351.content: Are you really his underwear
1351.title: William's Toy Story-print underwear (tighty...

choices: Mom hands Sydney the bikini to take home
Mom tells Sydney the family's going swimming; she should dress and join!
Mom tells Sydney everything about the transfer
1352.content:
Waking up, a great divide splits your body. One half lays spread out over the phone, triangular, stringy, and scrunched up in a pleasant way; you sense this half like it's the lower part of your body, from the hips to the feet, even though it's no bigger than seven inches across, four inches in width, unstretched. The other half remains on one of the chairs connected to the machine, padded, stringy, and stretched its full length until parts of you--the string-parts, your "arms"--hang off the chair; this half is your torso, head, and arms all in one. You can't move either half; you see through the torso-section but you don't have any eyes; you hear but can't feel ears; you try to grumble, gurgle, articulate, but no vocal chords accomodate you, so you only think, What the fuck? over and over until a shadow falls over you.

You only have a moment to think, That's mom, before she picks up both halves and piles them in her arms, "legs" on top of "torso." Her breasts stare back at you while she walks the length of the living room, her footsteps booming like cannon-fire. You're no bigger than a kitten, if it was anorexic and chopped in half. You hear something ring in the distance: the doorbell.

"Right on schedule..." Mom mutters.

What did you do to me, Mom? you think, more irritated than scared now that you know who to blame. She opens the door and another shadow falls across you; you're caught between your mom and the unseen woman's bodies, staring at your mother's breasts, aware you're the same size as them. Does this have to do with your stupid Nobel Peace Prize? I thought you quit!

A voice from the doorway interrupts your thought. It speaks with the density of distant stars: "Hey Mrs. Williams," it says, addressing my mom. "You wanted me to come over?"

You recognize that voice anywhere: it's your girlfriend Sydney, the sweetest soul anyone could ever meet but naive like all hell. You want to scream out her name, but your new form denies you this satisfaction while Mom answers, "Yes, Sydney. You left your bikini in Austin's room last week, when you came over."

"Oooohhh. I'm sorry, Mrs. Williams. I don't... I don't remember bringing it here, or swimming any time recently."

Yeah, you think. Neither do I... And then, with startling abruptness, Wait! Am I the bikini?
1352.title: Your Girlfriend's Bikini

choices: Sydney demands she change you back
Sydney likes this; she wants to keep you
13523.content:
"All right," Mom says, "I didn't want to tell you so soon. I thought I'd save it until we had some more time to observe, but you should probably know..."

"What is this?" Sydney asks. Whatever she wanted to say next catches in her throat. Instead, she says, "Is this one of your experiments?"

Of course, Sydney ended up discovering your mom's mad little secret, both because you needed someone to confide in that wouldn't rat you out to Mom, and Sydney had ended up as an occasional test subject herself, not to the same extent as you've been, but "minor" alterations, like making her bald for a day or turning her into her own mother. These were trifles compared to what you often got, including this new incident...

"In fact, it is," Mom continues. "I took this bikini from you, I don't know when, it was a long time ago, and I've successfully created a machine that can transfer human souls between vessels, whether human or object. Inside your bikini right now is--"

Sydney's eyes bulge. She snatches the bikini top from your mom, turning you over, trying to stare through the nylon, stretching you out. The space between your eyes, the string that functions basically as your nose, extends in both direction. You feel like you're about to snap in half, horizontally AND vertically! This knowledge does not fill you with the dread it should.

"You mean... You've put Austin inside my bikini?'

"Yes," Mom says proudly. "He can't talk, can't interact with you, but I promise you, his mind is in there, thinking and observing the world from his tiny cloth vantage point."
13523.title: Knowledgeable Sydney

choices: You are Jessica's favorite ballerina figurine (she's 5; figure is 2 inches)
You are Kari's cell phone (she's 22; phone is a flip-phone)
You are a store mannequin (female, age 5-7)
You are Alayna's toothbrush (she's 16; not battery-operated)
You are Sydney's favorite collectible porcelain doll (she's 18; doll is 12")

...a bunch of items on the kitchen table.

"Why did we get stuff from charity?" you ask, incredulous.
"We didn't," snaps Mom. "This is an experiment! Just sit on that chair."

You walk over to an odd-looking machine, sitting in one of the chairs connected to it.

Your mother places the ____ on the other chair, then pushes a button on the machine.

WHUMPH!!! Everything goes black.


When you wake up...
14.title: A bunch of items on the kitchen table (NEW:  So...

info.brief_description: All 3 "TTIW" stories, rolled into one!  Also with new (???), and good old chapters!
info.description:
Okay, my first co-op interactive, with wanderer0426: The Time I Wasn't Myself! This is taking all three previous Items and rolling them into one! Also present will be updated statistics (it's been about 3 years since I've added anything anywhere on this site), some new characters, and some old characters, as well as some of my favorite chapters from the originals!

Characters:

Austin (you): 18, male, 5'4", slightly overweight; doesn't care about looks, hygeine (for the most part), self-image, or what anyone else thinks about him; protective of his family and possessions; stubborn as f***, but puts up with Mom's experiments (albeit begrudgingly)
Mom: 42, 5'2", slightly overweight; inventor of the BSM (Body-Swapping Machine); runs experiments on Austin whether he likes it or not

Jessica: 5, 3'5", gymnast's build; Austin's little sister; bratty when around Austin, but like a little angel around anyone else; definitely not a tomboy
Kari: 22, 5'3", overweight due to past pregnancy; Austin's older sister; a bit of a slut, she moves from boy to boy constantly; likes many things Austin likes
William: 5, 3'8", slim; Austin's nephew and Kari's son; hyper-active, much like any normal 5-year-old boy

Alayna: 16, 5'3", slim; Austin's cousin; darker skin due to Hawaiian ancestry on paternal side; avid dancer and cheerleader, almost never gets in trouble; speaks with an ever-so-slight lisp (no explanation)
Sydney: 18, 5'0", normal build; Austin's girlfriend; pure-minded, slightly girly, never gets in trouble; only child of a bank-owning family

Will add more characters as they come; also, feel free to add your own characters!

Rules:
1. No intricately-detailed sex scenes; a little is fine, but be cautious - I reserve the right to delete or edit chapters as necessary.
2. Stay true to all characters' descriptions: In the originals, people would often change characters to their liking - a majority of the above characters are real people (hence no last names).
3. Try to write with as good grammar as possible - no text language! (Although 'Engrish' would be awesome!"
4. Be realistic (other than the fact that you've switched bodies with someone/thing!).
5. No "Makeover Machine" stuff - that was irritating in the originals, and I won't put up with it now.
6. Have fun!
